EXTRACTION_PROTOCOL: Chromatin was extracted using the histone protocol. Cells are crosslinked 10 min in 1% formaldehyde. Washed twice in PBS and dissolved in shearing buffer (containing 1% SDS), such that the final concentration is 15*10^6 cells/ml.
CHIP_PROTOCOL: Transcription factor protocol: 100.000 cells per ChIP (5x) and pool at the end. Overnight incubation of chromatin with antibody and A/G magnetic beads. Wash twice with buffer 1, once with buffer 2 and 3 and twice with buffer 4 at 4 degrees. Elute 20 min with elution buffer at RT. Descrosslink 4 hours at 65 degrees. Purify by column purification.

DIFFERENTIATION_METHOD: Drexler HG chapter 16 Establishment and culture of leukemia-lymphoma cell in Cancer Cell Culture Methods and Protocols 2nd Edition Springer Berlin pp 181 to 200 in 2011
